mapper.select: SELECT `user`.`password` , `user`.userid , '1' usertype , `user`.acctoken , `user`.accestoken , landlord.landstate from `user` INNER JOIN landlord on `user`.userid = landlord.landuserid where `user`.telephone = #{telephone}

SELECT `user`.`password` , `user`.userid , '2' usertype , `user`.acctoken , `user`.accestoken from `user` INNER JOIN landlord_manager on `user`.userid = landlord_manager.manageruserid where `user`.telephone = #{telephone}

SELECT MIN(usercent.start_time)start_time , MAX(usercent.end_time)end_time, usercent.usercentnum , usercent.userid , `profile`.real_name realname, `user`.telephone , usercent.houseid , house.house_number, house.floor , apartment.apartmentname , building.building , village.villagename from usercent LEFT JOIN `profile` on `profile`.user_id = usercent.userid LEFT JOIN `user` on `profile`.user_id = `user`.userid LEFT JOIN house on usercent.houseid = house.houseid LEFT JOIN building on house.buildingid = building.buildingid LEFT JOIN apartment on house.apartment_id = apartment.apartmentid LEFT JOIN village on village.villageid = building.villageid where usercent.usercentnum = #{usercentnum}

SELECT usercent.start_time, usercent.end_time, usercent.usercentid, ss.fname, rentmodal.rentname , housepay.centprices , IFNULL(payother.centprices,'0')currentprices , usercent.paystyleid , IFNULL(historycent.historycenturl,'') historycenturl, usercent.centtimes from usercent LEFT JOIN payexpert on payexpert.usercentid = usercent.usercentid INNER JOIN rentmodal on usercent.rentmodalid = rentmodal.rentmodalid INNER JOIN (SELECT rentmodalid ,rentname fname from rentmodal)ss on rentmodal.fatherid = ss.rentmodalid INNER JOIN housepay on housepay.payexpertid = payexpert.payexpertid LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(housepay.centprices)centprices , payexpert.usercentid from housepay LEFT JOIN payexpert on payexpert.payexpertid = housepay.payexpertid where housepay.financeid in (SELECT finance.financeid FROM finance where fatherid = 6) GROUP BY payexpert.usercentid) payother on payother.usercentid = usercent.usercentid LEFT JOIN historycent on historycent.usercentid = usercent.usercentid where usercent.usercentnum = #{usercentnum} and housepay.financeid = 30

SELECT housepay.centprices currentprices, finance.categoryname from housepay LEFT JOIN finance on housepay.financeid = finance.financeid LEFT JOIN payexpert on payexpert.payexpertid = housepay.payexpertid where payexpert.usercentid = #{usercentid} and payexpert.payexpertid = (SELECT MIN(payexpertid) from housepay where usercentid = #{usercentid} )

SELECT usercent.usercentid , usercent.usercentnum , usercent.centtimes , usercent.yaprices , usercent.centprices , usercent.start_time , usercent.end_time , house.house_number , village.villagename, building.building FROM usercent LEFT JOIN house on house.houseid = usercent.houseid LEFT JOIN building on building.buildingid = house.buildingid LEFT JOIN village on building.villageid = village.villageid WHERE usercent.userid = #{userid} AND usercent.centstate IN (1, 2) ORDER BY usercentnum, usercent.centtimes ASC

SELECT usercent.usercentid , usercent.usercentnum , usercent.centtimes , usercent.yaprices , usercent.centprices , usercent.start_time , usercent.end_time , house.house_number , village.villagename, building.building FROM usercent LEFT JOIN house on house.houseid = usercent.houseid LEFT JOIN building on building.buildingid = house.buildingid LEFT JOIN village on building.villageid = village.villageid WHERE usercent.usercentnum = #{usercentnum} AND usercent.centstate IN (1, 2) ORDER BY usercentnum, usercent.centtimes ASC
